home.h1: We care for their life, their story, and their home, with a service as unique as they are.
home.description: We are the trusted choice for hundreds of families seeking the best in-home care for their loved ones.

caregivers.h1: Join CareMe, the platform that connects caregivers with families in need of your services.
caregivers.description: CareMe offers you the opportunity to find clients quickly and easily, with all the necessary tools to perform your job effectively. Join us and make a difference in the lives of those who need it most.
caregivers.benefit1: Find clients more quickly and easily, without relying on traditional platforms like Facebook.
caregivers.benefit2: Receive support at all times, with personalized attention to resolve any doubts and help you improve your experience.
caregivers.benefit3: Enjoy multiple features that improve your service and make your work easier, with no charges for the service. Only a low 10% commission per service!
caregivers.testimonial1Description: As a professional caregiver with over 5 years of experience, CareMe has been an incredibly valuable platform. Since joining, I've been able to find clients much faster than I anticipated. The platform greatly facilitates the organization of my activities and communication with families. I am very happy to be part of the CareMe team and to be able to make a positive difference in the lives of my patients.
caregivers.testimonial2Description: With years of experience dedicated to caring for the elderly, CareMe has revolutionized the way I work. Thanks to this platform, I have found clients quickly and consistently. The tools offered by CareMe greatly simplify my daily routine, allowing me to focus on providing the best possible care. I am very satisfied to be part of the CareMe professional community.

family.h1: Choose CareMe to take care of your loved ones
family.description: CareMe gives you the opportunity to find the best care for your family members, with verified and professional caregivers. Join our platform and give your family the best care.
family.benefit1: Access a network of verified caregivers and quickly find the help your family needs.
family.benefit2: Our team is always available to ensure that your experience with CareMe is the best.
family.benefit3: CareMe is free, and only charges a low 10% commission per service.
family.securityFeature1: Activate the emergency button to share your location in real-time and contact emergency services.
family.securityFeature2: Each service is geolocated, allowing you to know where the caregiver is at all times.
family.securityFeature3: Our customer service team is available 24/7 for any inquiries or emergencies.
family.testimonial1Description: Thanks to CareMe, I was able to find the best caregiver for my mother. The experience was wonderful and reliable.
family.testimonial2Description: I love the platform, the caregivers are very professional and always available for any questions.

contact.description: Do you have any questions or need assistance? We are here to help you. Fill out the form and we will get in touch with you as soon as possible.
contact.name: First Name

about.description: At CareMe, we are a Peruvian company committed to transforming the care of dependent people in Peru. Our mission is to provide families with a reliable, affordable, and high-quality home care service.
about.mission: To be the leading platform in Peru that connects professional caregivers with families who need specialized care for their loved ones. Our commitment is to improve the quality of life for dependent individuals.
about.vision: We aim to be the company that defines the future of home care in the country, through innovation, technology, and a human-centered approach that promotes the well-being of the elderly and dependent individuals.
about.whyCareMeDescription: CareMe is more than just a platform to find caregivers. We offer a comprehensive solution that makes it easy to find the ideal caregiver, ensuring safety, professionalism, and trust at all times.

support.description: At CareMe, we are committed to providing you with the best support. Here you will find answers to frequently asked questions and helpful tips.
support.tips: Make sure to keep your profile updated and always communicate clearly with your caregiver or client to avoid confusion.

faq1.question: How do I register on CareMe?
faq1.answer: You can register as a requester or caregiver through the registration form on the homepage.

faq2.question: Is CareMe free?
faq2.answer: Yes, the platform is free for caregivers, but we charge a small commission for each completed service.

faq3.question: How can I contact support?
faq3.answer: If you have any issues, you can contact our support team through the contact form in the 'Contact Us' section.
